title: r/Maliciouscompliance How I Got My Boss Fired By Obeying Her Terrible Instructions
description: r/Maliciouscompliance haven't you ever wished that you could get your boss fired? In today's video, OP has an opportunity to do exactly that. OP's smug boss tells him, "Don't help me unless I ask for your help!" Of course, the boss is incredibly incompetent at her job and has no idea what she's doing, so OP happily sits back and watches her crash and burn even though he knows that he could save her. So long, boss! If you like this content, subscribe for more Reddit videos!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
